Frontend Developer.description: Build responsive user interfaces using React, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Tailwind and modern frontend frameworks.

Backend Developer.description: Develop scalable backend APIs using Python, FastAPI, databases, authentication and server-side logic.

Full Stack Developer.description: Work on both frontend and backend, building complete web applications using React, Python and databases.

Machine Learning Engineer.description: Build machine learning models, data pipelines, NLP systems and deploy AI solutions.
